author: sky.cactus
content:
<@543900561460822016> https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/actions/runs/15736706956/job/44351275429?pr=667
I think this failed on the PR *after* we merged `eth_simulateV1` when the next person submitted a PR.  This suggests that the `lint-and-check` job is running against `main` rather than the PR that triggered the run, so it will always fail on the next PR after a merge that introduced a bug.
cc <@137094067015122944> <@962726279336046633>

author: sky.cactus
content: This is my suspicion from the symptoms, though I glanced at the CI job and didn't see any obvious mistakes like this.

author: sky.cactus
content: The error is an accurate error (it should be complaining as it is), what is surprising is that it was totally happy to let us merge `eth_simulateV1` and then when some unfortunate dev came along after us trying to suggest a completely unrelated change their PR failed.

author: thnhnv
content: Hi, can I get access to the Zoom link?

author: thnhnv
content: Thank you for letting me talk today regarding this newly proposed EIP. We would love to get more comments from the community, node implementers, wallet and library maintainers. Also added the slides (cc <@827653956955406406>).
